description: Come discover the untapped value of logs through real life Java examples: we will deep dive into specific best practices such as fast troubleshooting & easy investigation, Real User Monitoring, or getting business values out of your machine data. See for yourself how easy it is to ensure smooth app performance & user experience with logs!
